people_also_ask.heading: Half-Life 2 was released on November 16, 2004 and received acclaim for its advanced physics, animation, sound, AI, graphics, and narrative. It won 39 Game of the Year awards, and has been cited as one of the best games of all time.

knowledge_panel.description: half-life 2 is a 2004 first-person shooter game developed and published by valve. like the original half-life, it combines shooting, puzzles, and storytelling, and adds features such as vehicles and physics-based gameplay. wikipedia
